panels.content:
Flow Data for Circuits

This dashboard provides flow data for the top ten sources and destinations by volume and rate for circuits.
Click on an organization name in one of the tables to see the flow data dashboard for that organization.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

panels.title: Top 10 Organization Pairs by Data Volume
